mapper.sql: uuid, name, content, create_id, create_name, phone, files, status, create_time, update_time, community_id, flag
mapper.select:
select c.*, u.truename as u_create_name , u.head_pic as u_head_pic from tb_complaint c left join tb_peoples u on u.uuid = c.create_id where
c.create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
c.name = #{name.jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
c.status = #{status.jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
c.flag = 1
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_complaint
uuid,
name,
content,
create_id,
create_name,
phone,
files,
status,
create_time,
update_time,
community_id,
flag,

mapper.update:
update tb_complaint
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_name = #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
files = #{files,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
community_id = #{communityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tb_complaint set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_name = #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, files = #{files,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, community_id = #{communityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
